title: Abstractions and Concretes

articles.content:
Abstractions as such do not exist: they are merely man’s epistemological method
of perceiving that which exists—and that which exists is concrete.
articles.attribution:
“The Psycho-Epistemology of Art,”
The Romantic Manifesto, 23

acknowledgement:
“The Psycho-Epistemology of Art,”
